requirements.label: Spend
requirements.description: Treat yourself to 0.2% p.a. bonus interest when you spend at least S$500 monthly or more on eligible retail spend with your Citibank Debit Mastercard® and/or Citi Cash Back+ Mastercard®.
conditions: Achieve an aggregate eligible retail spend of at least S$500 per calendar month^ ('Spend Mission') on eligible Citibank Debit Cards and/or Citi Cash Back+ Mastercard® as a main cardmember (collectively referred to as “Cards” and each, a 'Card')*.
Please refer to Bank Website on Excluded Debit Card Spends for full details.

To determine whether you have met the Spend Mission criteria on the Citi Cash Back+ Mastercard®, only eligible retail spend on the Citi Cash Back+ Mastercard® for the relevant calendar month will be taken into account.

The Bank will determine the eligible retail spend date on a Card by the date that the relevant spend/transaction is posted by the Bank to the Card account, which is typically a few days after the date that the cardholder authorized by the cardholder to be charged to the Card ('Transaction Date').
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Posting Date.

requirements.label: Insure
requirements.description: Protect your financial future with a bonus 0.6% p.a. interest on your savings with a policy of minimum S$5,000 regular premium.
conditions: Purchase a new regular premium insurance policy owned by the Primary Account Holder with an annualized premium of at least S$5,000 (“Insure Mission”).
Insurance policies purchased or paid for using Central Provident Fund Savings or under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are excluded.
If the insurance policy is cancelled, the Bank reserves the right to reverse the amount of Bonus Interests posted to your account.
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Issuance Date for 12 months.

requirements.label: Invest
requirements.description: Make 3 investments (unit trusts) of S$1,000 or more and get yourself additional 0.6% p.a. interest on your savings.
conditions: Perform 3 eligible investment transactions in a calendar month ('Invest Mission'). Investment transactions must be settled within the calendar month.
Unit trust purchase of at least S$1,000, either through one-time purchase or Regular Savings Plan. Exclusions apply.
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Settlement Date.

requirements.label: Invest
requirements.description: Make 3 investments (securities) of S$5,000 or more and get yourself additional 0.6% p.a. interest on your savings.
conditions: Perform 3 eligible investment transactions in a calendar month ('Invest Mission'). Investment transactions must be settled within the calendar month.
Buy order for securities listed on any stock exchange in the United States of America, Singapore and Hong Kong with minimum transaction value of S$5,000.
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Settlement Date.

requirements.label: Invest
requirements.description: Make 3 investments (foreign currency exchange) of S$1,000 or more and get yourself additional 0.6% p.a. interest on your savings.
conditions: Perform 3 eligible investment transactions in a calendar month ('Invest Mission'). Investment transactions must be settled within the calendar month.
Foreign currency exchange ('FX') transactions that include currency conversion made between your own accounts (including joint accounts) and valued in the current calendar month.
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Settlement Date.

requirements.label: Save
requirements.description: Increase your balance by S$1,500 or more and be rewarded with 0.2% p.a. interest on incremental savings.
conditions: Increase your account’s average daily balance from previous month’s average daily balance by at least S$1,500 ('Save Mission').
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Saving Date.

requirements.label: Home Loan
requirements.description: Take up a home loan of S$500,000 or more with Citi to unlock a sweet bonus of 0.8% p.a. interest on your savings.
conditions: Sign up for a new home loan of at least S$500,000 ('Mortgage Mission').
Exclude Mortgage Loans with Interest Offset features; and Overdraft facilities.
Bonus interest crediting commences two months after Disbursement Date for 12 months.

requirements.label: Birthday
requirements.description: Celebrate your birthday with an extra 0.1% p.a. birthday bonus interest, just for being you.
conditions: Keep your account open through the entire period of your birthday month ('Birthday Mission').
Bonus interest crediting commences one month after Birthday Month.
